attributes.action: Stand Up Speak Up to Sir Alex Ferguson
attributes.additional_details: After the comments made by Sir Alex regarding Newcastle United and seeing his behaviour on the touch line during the Newcastle game and many before, it is time for The FA to stop Being so linient on Sir Alex Ferguson.  There seems to be a compleatly separate rule book for his which means he can do/say what he wants without consequence.  It's time he is treat him the same as any other football manager.
